title: Top 5 Game - Changing Agricultural Technologies in 2024

subtasks: Understanding AI-powered crop monitoring
Discussing Autonomous farming vehicles
Exploring Vertical farming systems
Analyzing Smart irrigation systems
Examining Blockchain in supply chain transparency
Predicting impact of these technologies on 2024 farming

tasks.task: Setup and Maintenance of AI-Powered Crop Monitoring Systems
subtasks: Mounting sensors and cameras in the field
Configuring data analytics software
Calibrating sensors for accurate soil and moisture readings

tasks.task: Setup and Maintenance of AI-Powered Crop Monitoring Systems
subtasks: Setting up satellite imagery and drone technology in fields
Installing ground sensors for real-time data collection
Configuring AI data analytics software for alerts
Regularly checking and cleaning field sensors

tasks.task: Operation and Maintenance of Autonomous Farming Vehicles
subtasks: Setting up GPS markers and ground-truthing fields
Programming tractors and harvesters for autonomous operation
Maintenance of autonomous vehicle hardware and software

tasks.task: Installation and Management of Vertical Farming Systems
subtasks: Building vertical farming structures such as racks and hydroponic systems
Configuring LED lighting schedules and intensity
Managing indoor environmental controls (temperature, humidity)
Regularly checking and adjusting water and nutrient delivery

tasks.task: Setup and Calibration of Smart Irrigation Systems
subtasks: Installing soil moisture sensors throughout fields
Configuring smart irrigation controllers with weather data
Regularly calibrating soil sensors for accuracy
Inputting farm data into a blockchain system
Verifying logs and entries related to farm operations

tasks.task: if a farmer has to perform data entry on a computer or mobile device, that is a physical task. So under MAINTASK: Blockchain for Supply Chain Transparency, the subtask could be "Enter farm data into the blockchain system". But since data entry is minimal, and more about tracking, perhaps it's not a significant physical task. The video mentions blockchain ensuring transparency but might not require active farmer participation. Therefore, maybe excluding that task.

subtasks: Mounting cameras and drones in fields

tasks.task: Operation and Maintenance of Autonomous Farming Vehicles
subtasks: Installing GPS markers in fields

tasks.task: Installation and Management of Vertical Farming Systems
subtasks: Building hydroponic grow racks within a structure
Adjusting LED lighting schedules
Monitoring environmental controls like temperature and humidity

tasks.task: Setup and Calibration of Smart Irrigation Systems
subtasks: Installing soil moisture sensors in fields
Configuring systems with weather data
Regularly testing and calibrating soil sensors
Mounting cameras and drones in fields — covers physical placement of devices.
Configuring software for real-time data analysis — might be considered part of setup. However, since the task is ongoing (as data needs to be continuously analyzed), maybe it's a separate subtask.
